languages.english-overview:
StatusNet is the open source microblogging platform that helps you share and connect in real-time within your own domain. With StatusNet you can encourage collaboration, build and engage your community, and be in command of your brand.
StatusNet is released under the AGPLv3 terms.
languages.english-features:
The features are as follows:
Groups
Popular Notices
File Sharing
Interface with Other Social Networks
Mobile and Desktop Access
Plug-ins
Customizable Interface
languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
